CustomField.formula: 'Cont Type: '+TEXT( Container_Type__c )+'| Cont Number: '+ Container_Number__c +'| Seal No: '+ Seal_Number__c +'| Cargo Quantity: '+ TEXT( Cargo_Quantity__c )+' '+ TEXT( Cargo_Unit__c )+'(s)' +'| G.W: '+ TEXT( Gross_WeightKg__c ) +' Kg'+'| CBM: '+ TEXT( MeasurementCBM__c )
CustomField.label: Container Summary
